EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_CIO_Event_at_S1P_Q318.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Experience | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Executive Experience on September 25 and 26. We will be in touch closer to the event with further details. In the meantime, if you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
Date: September 25 and 26, 2018
Location:
Oxon Hill Manor 6901 Oxon Hill Rd Oxon Hill, MD 20745 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Oxon+Hill+Manor/@38.7937861,-77.0058627,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x967060a0d1174103?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjj4_PKj5rcAhWBAHwKHbHxBkoQ_BIIyAEwFw]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there! The Pivotal Team
